resources.string: Lock screen won\'t dim while displaying visualizer
Lock screen will dim in accordance with system settings
You may need to restart SystemUI (or reboot) in order to see changes.

Display visualizer in front of keyguard ui
Visualizer will be displayed in front of UI elements. This may improve it\'s visibility.
Visualizer will be displayed behind UI elements
